resources.string:
Hi there, please try our game, pretty please? We are poor
 indie game developers and we would love for you to play and share if you like
 the game. Make us rich so we can improve the game!

You will need to get from the start point to the end point (Slide left or right). You will encounter enemies along your way and will need to use your actions to get rid of them. The buttons on the bottom go as:

 1 -> Fists : Good against the guards 
 2 -> Bombs: Good against anything on screen
 3 -> Third: Good against the guards and robo dogs.
 You earn more points the less amount of items used

You will need to dodge or combat your way to the end point. You can only slide up or down at this level. The following buttons will help you combat the enemies 

 1 -> Laser Bullet: There for determining distance
 2 -> Rocket Missile: Destroys anything in its path
 3 -> Nuclear Bomb: Destroys anything shown on screen
 You earn more points the less amount of items used.
